data.title: Kevin McNally
data.text:
Born: 27-Apr-1956

Birthplace: Bristol, England

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: England

Executive summary: Pirates of the Caribbean

Wife: Phyllis Logan (actress, two children)

High School: Central Grammar School for Boys

Conservatory: Royal Academy of Dramatic Art
